data.title: Office of the President
data.meta_description: The Office of the President empowers your bold and boundless journey by shaping a student-centered experience around your passions, ambitions, and preferences.
data.text:
NAU aims to be the nation’s preeminent engine of opportunity, vehicle of economic mobility, and driver of social impact by delivering equitable postsecondary value in Arizona and beyond.

Meet President JosÃ© Luis Cruz Rivera

JosÃ© Luis Cruz Rivera began his tenure as the 17th president of Northern Arizona University (NAU) on June 14, 2021.

NAU: 125 years of Elevating Excellence

For 125 years, weâve learned, grown, explored, and cheered together. Generation after generation of proud Lumberjacks built and nurtured a rich legacy of academic excellence and a vibrant community. We celebrate our rich history and look ahead to a future of unlimited possibilities in this video.

Strategic Plan: Elevating Excellence

Elevating Excellence is our roadmap for delivering a bold and boundless future for all. The strategic priorities described represent a robust synthesis of the NAU communityâs thoughtful engagement and bold aspirations for the future, and it reflects the evolving challenges and opportunities that we face as an engaged public institution of higher education. Together, we will capitalize on NAUâs 122-year history of distinctive excellence as an engine of opportunity to drive social impact and economic mobility for the people of Arizona and beyond.

News Presidential statements

Stay up-to-date on our exciting announcements and initiatives from the Office of the President.

President’s cabinet

The Presidentâs Cabinet is comprised of the leaders of President Cruz Riveraâs strategic, operational, and advisory leadership team. This team advances, leads, and coordinates broad efforts across NAUâs academic and administrative departments to meet the universityâs vision and mission.

Leadership searches

The Office of the President is proud of NAUâs longstanding legacyâadvancing education, pursuing innovation on local and national platforms, and creating new opportunities for Arizonaâs students. We are making these efforts possible by seeking the most qualified, forward-thinking, and diverse collection of leaders to guide the university.

Contact the office

Contact us belowâwhether to request a meeting, invite the president to attend an event, or submit a student-interview request to President Cruz Rivera.

Please contact president@nau.edu or call 928-523-3232 with general inquiries.
